{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = 3Com_AirConnect_3CRWE777A_(module) |wikipedia = |brand = 3Com |model = 3CRWE777A |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = (module) |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 06/03/2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/3Com_AirConnect_3CRWE777A_(module) |sernum = |wlclass = B11 |series = |if = PCMCIA (16-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 0101 |device_id = 0777 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = LLM002WL11000-1 |icid = 37321032225A317 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:01:03,00:04:75 |chip1 = Harris;HFA3841; |chip2 = Intersil;HFA3861; |chip3 = Intersil;HFA3683A; |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Eumitcom |manuf_model = WL11000 |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/19/2000 |estreldate = |price = |upc = 662705307060 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00BKEQ79S |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== OEM '''Eumitcom''' WL11000 (as a PCI adapter kit, the WL11000P) This adapter is sold as part of a kit for a PCI NIC. It uses a [[3Com AirConnect 3CRWE777A (bridge)|PLX PCI adapter]]. [http://gothmog.homeunix.net/blog/?p=78 3CRWE777A in NetBSD w/ OUI mention]
[http://www.linuxquestions.org/questions/linux-networking-3/redhat-9-0-3com-airconnect-3crwe777a-114501/ linux-wlan-ng log dump] {{hostap_diag |nicid=8002 |pri_id=0015 |pri_ver=0.3.0 |sta_id=001f |sta_ver=1.7.1}} .. however, I did upgrade the STA firmware. The PCMCIA module used with the adapter is 3.3V keyed. ==Pictures== [[File:3Com 3CRWE777A top.jpg|600px]]
[[File:3Com 3CRWE777A bot.jpg|600px]] [[Has images::external| ]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
